from manim import *
import numpy as np
import random as ran


class MonteCarlo(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        helloworldc = Code("temp.py",
                           background="rectangle",
                           generate_html_file=True
                           )
        self.play(Write(helloworldc), run_time=1.3)
        self.wait()
